description:
This course explores an aspect of literary theory intensively; specific course topics vary from year to year. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: TOPICS LITERARY THEORY: New Materialisms and New Mythologies:  Bathes, Benjamin, Bataille, Blanchot
